summary:
If you’re looking for a professional and experienced translator who:

- is trained and certified in the attainment of the standard requirements for Subtitling, Closed Captioning, and SDH
- delivers error-free translations in any required format
- never missed a deadline
- aims to keep her clients happy
- has highlight projects shown on the big streaming platforms and Dutch television channels

look no further and get in touch to discuss details, deadlines, and rates. I’m sure we can become a great team!

I have a background in social work and years of experience as a self-employed person before I started an online career working remotely from Asia. I have been working as a digital nomad for almost two years now which helped me to develop my communication skills online as well. My aim is to offer services of high quality that meet your preferences and requirements.

I’m trained, certified and experienced to work with OOONA Tools, the software that I use to create, edit and translate subtitles in Dutch and English.

Again feel free to get in touch with me for any questions or more information.
